mapper.sql: purchas.id as id, purchas.contract_no as contractN, purchas.status as status, purchas.consignee_id as consigneeId, profile.first_name as consigneeFirstName, profile.last_name as consigneeLastName, profile.tel_number as consigneePhone, profile.country_code as consigneeCountryCode, profile.email as consigneeEmail, purchas.factory_id as factoryId, factory.factory_name as factoryName, factory.contact_first_name as factoryContactFirstName, factory.contact_last_name as factoryContactLastName, factory.contact_phone_country_code as factoryContactPhoneCountryCode, factory.contact_phone as factoryContactPhone, factory.contact_email as factoryContactEmail, factory.contact_full_name as factoryContactFullName, purchas.total_price as totalPrice, purchas.total_qty as partsQty, purchas.created_time as createdTime, purchas.payment_type as paymentType

payment.id as id, payment.payment_status as status, payment.purchas_id as bizId, payment.amount as amount, payment.amount_proportion as paymentRatio, payment.invoice_num as invoiceNum, payment.invoice_picture as invoicePicture, payment.payment_day as dayNum, payment.payment_time as actualPaymentDate, payment.description as remark, payment.payment_type as paymentType, payment.planned_payment_time as estimatedPaymentDate
mapper.select: select count(st.sta) as totalCount, st.sta as status from (select case when status = '6' then '2' when status = '7' then '2' else '1' end as sta from ope_purchas) st group by status

select product.id as id, product.bom_no as partsN, product.en_name as enName, product.cn_name as cnName, '4' as productType, product.procurement_cycle as leadTime from ope_production_scooter_bom product
and product.dr=0 and product.bom_status=1
and ( product.bom_no like concat("%",#{enter.keyword},"%") or product.en_name like concat("%",#{enter.keyword},"%") or product.cn_name like concat("%",#{enter.keyword},"%") )

select count(*) from ope_purchas purchas left join ope_sys_user_profile profile on purchas.consignee_id = profile.id and profile.dr=0 left join ope_factory factory on factory.id = purchas.factory_id and factory.dr=0

select
from ope_purchas_payment payment where payment.dr = 0
and payment.purchas_id in
#{item}

select
from ope_purchas purchas left join ope_sys_user_profile profile on purchas.consignee_id = profile.sys_user_id and profile.dr=0 left join ope_factory factory on factory.id = purchas.factory_id and factory.dr=0 where purchas.id = #{id}

select trace.id as id, trace.status as status, trace.event as event, trace.event_time as eventTime, trace.create_by as createdBy, profile.first_name as createdByFirstName, profile.last_name as createdByLastName, trace.memo as memo from ope_purchas_trace trace inner join ope_sys_user_profile profile on trace.create_by = profile.sys_user_id and profile.dr = 0 where trace.dr = 0 and trace.purchas_id =#{id} order by trace.create_time asc

select qc.pass_count as passQty, qc.fail_count as failQty, qc.batch_no as batchN, qc.quality_inspection_time as qcDate, profile.sys_user_id as inspectorId, profile.first_name as inspectorFirstName, profile.last_name as inspectorLastName, profile.full_name as inspectorFullName, qc.purchas_b_id as pruchasBId from ope_purchas_b_qc qc left join ope_sys_user_profile profile on qc.quality_inspector_id = profile.sys_user_id and profile.dr=0 where 1=1
and qc.purchas_b_id in
#{item}
and (qc.quality_inspection_time between #{enter.qcStartTime} and #{enter.qcEndTime})

select purchas.id as id, purchas.factory_id as factoryId, factory.factory_name as factoryName, purchas.factory_annex as annex from ope_purchas purchas left join ope_factory factory on purchas.factory_id = factory.id and factory.dr = 0 where purchas.dr = 0 and purchas.id =#{id}

select purchasb.supplier_id as id, purchasb.part_id as partsId, supplier.supplier_name as supplierName, purchasb.supplier_annex as annex, supplier.contact_first_name as supplierContactFirstName, supplier.contact_last_name as supplierContactLastName, supplier.contact_full_name as supplierContactFullName, supplier.contact_phone_country_code as supplierContactCountryCode, supplier.contact_phone as supplierContactPhone, supplier.contact_email as supplierContactEmail from ope_purchas_b purchasb left join ope_supplier supplier on purchasb.supplier_id = supplier.id and supplier.dr = 0 where purchasb.dr = 0 and purchasb.purchas_id =#{id}

select qc.* from ope_purchas_b_qc qc left join ope_purchas_b purchasb on qc.purchas_b_id = purchasb.id and purchasb.dr = 0 left join ope_purchas purchas on purchas.id = purchasb.purchas_id and purchas.dr = 0 where purchas.id =#{id}

select qc.purchas_b_id as pruchasBId, profile.sys_user_id as inspectorId, profile.first_name as inspectorFirstName, profile.last_name as inspectorLastName, profile.full_name as inspectorFullName, qc.pass_count as passQty, qc.fail_count as failQty, qc.batch_no as batchN, qc.quality_inspection_time as qcDate from ope_purchas_b_qc qc inner join ope_sys_user_profile profile on qc.quality_inspector_id = profile.sys_user_id and profile.dr = 0 where qc.dr = 0
and qc.purchas_b_id in
#{item}
and qc.pass_count !=0
and qc.fail_count !=0
and ( qc.quality_inspection_time between #{enter.qcStartTime} and #{enter.qcEndTime})
order by batchN
mapper.update: update ope_purchas_b set qc_status=#{status} where ope_purchas_b.dr=0 and ope_purchas_b.purchas_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select qc.* from ope_purchas_b purchasb inner join ope_purchas_b_qc qc on purchasb.id = qc.purchas_b_id where purchasb.purchas_id =#{id} and purchasb.dr = 0
